attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As road tax and fuel duty is excessive and beyond market forces, motorist being constantly hit by stealth taxes, future road charging.  Roads are disintegrating, or potholed, the government or councils, should be liable for resurfacing at least every 5 years or a fixed time frame All utility companies should be required to surface the whole side of the road not patchwork quilt it, 
 Damage to vehicles caused by these roads, someone should be liable for these cost inflicted on road users. As a health and safety issue, this should be strongly enforced.
